data.name: Fishing Planet: Daredevil Motorboat Pack
data.detailed_description:
Enjoy a complete on-the-water angling experience with the Daredevil Motorboat Pack to make your fishing adventures more thrilling than ever before.
The pack includes the speedy Garry Scott™ Lupus™ motorboat made of ultra durable rubber and equipped with a Pro level sonar, a super combo of GalaxyCast™ and VorteX™ Special Edition rod’n’reel, tons of minnows, a few crankbaits and other fishing equipment that you’ll need for a fantastic day out on the river!
Complete with 7-Day Pond Passes and Advanced Licenses for six amazing fishing destinations, including the fantastic Sander Baggersee Lake in Germany and the hardcore Akhtuba River in Russia - this pack has everything you need for a truly global motorboat fishing experience!

Daredevil Motorboat Pack includes:
* 40 000 CREDITS
* 20 BAITCOINS
* 7-DAY PREMIUM
* 5 Marker Buoys
* 1 Storage Box (10 Slots)
* 1 Tackle Setups

MOTOR BOATS
* Garry Scott™ Lupus Motor Boat - Length: 9.5ft. (290 cm); Width: 4,4 ft. (135 cm); Weight: 220 lb (100 kg); Engine: 35 hp; Echo Sounder: Pro

RODS ‘N REELS
Rods:
* GalaxyCast 180 SE - Length: 5' 11" (1.8 m); Lure Weight: 7/8 – 2 1/2 Oz. (24–70 g); Power: X Heavy; Line Weight: 8–35 Lb (6–16kg); Action: Moderate
Reels:
* VorteX 7000 SE - Ratio: 6.3:1; Recovery: 31.5"; Capacity: mono 32/140(0.5/140), braid 30/240(0.28/240); Max Drag: 33 Lb.; Brake: centrifugal

TERMINAL TACKLE
* Lines - Length 1000 yd (1000 m):
Braid .011" (0.28 mm) - Test: 30 Lb. (13.6 kg)
* Minnows: Triple Runner (х4); Deep Runner (x6)
* Crankbaits: Crankbait 2 m, #5/0 (x2)

EQUIPMENT
* GarryScott™ FishCastle L Plus - Max Single Fish Weight: 165 Lb. (75 kg); Total Fish Weight: 440 Lb. (200 kg)

POND PASSES (7 days):
Tiber River
White Moose Lake
St Croix Lake
San Joaquin Delta
Sander Baggersee Lake
Ahtuba River

FISHING LICENSES (7 days):
Advanced Italy License
Advanced Alberta License
Advanced Michigan License
Advanced California License
Advanced Germany License
Advanced Russia License

data.short_description: Enjoy a complete on-the-water angling experience with the Daredevil Motorboat Pack to make your fishing adventures more thrilling than ever before.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Polish, Russian, Ukrainian, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS Version - Windows 7, 8, 10 x64
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card Intel HD4600 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10 x64
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10.9 Mavericks
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 1,6 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card Intel HD4600 or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10.11 El Capitan
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M370X 2 GB GDDR5
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia Geforce 8600/9600GT (Driver v331), AMD HD 2xxx-4xxx (Driver mesa 10.5.9), AMD HD 5xxx+ (Driver mesa 10.5.9 or Catalyst 15.7), Intel HD 3000 (Driver mesa 10.6)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia Geforce 8600/9600GT (Driver v331), AMD HD 2xxx-4xxx (Driver mesa 10.5.9), AMD HD 5xxx+ (Driver mesa 10.5.9 or Catalyst 15.7), Intel HD 3000 (Driver mesa 10.6)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
